law.catch_line: Enforcement and administration by department -- Administrative regulations.
law.text: The department shall administer and enforce the provisions of this chapter and shall promulgate administrative regulations necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954.

metadata.lrc-note: .Pursuant to Acts 1962, ch. 139, sec. 2, the reviser has substituted "department of agriculture" for "department of agriculture, labor and statistics" in this chapter.
